Reviews.Title: i like this product nice done
Reviews.Author: Ricardo
Reviews.Content: well i have bought this cellphone and it has arrived to me, when i turned it on,  i was able to see that it`s fast, very pretty product , it comes with a protective case and it was great,, i love it screen and the feautures it`s allright, works fine, i wait that it could be stable and durable...it is fast to play 3d android games, i was testing a game named "jet stunt car, and it was fast and very good, i like the camera is nice is like 3mp real and nice flash , and well the front camera is not good enough but it`s great for the prices...i am please and thanksful for this,,,and well the only bad thing was the "box" it`s too simple an come some wrinkled , and it comes with a plastic cover with the cellphone it  came broken,,i dont like that...but for the rest it`s great ... nice android smartphone ..i recomend it ...but need a best package:Dthank you and happy Christmas

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Derek
Reviews.Content: What you get: Sufficient size screen, with fair touch sensitivity. The screen is of fair quality. It feels like commodity glass. The phone comes with a pre installed screen saver, and also a hard back case. The processor is fairly speedy, but the phone is only 256Mb. The flash is bright enough to use in the dark, but the CMOS sensor on the camera is not good for low light conditions. The 2MP camera is pretty good in outdoor well lit areas, good enough to snap those memories for a quick FB. You won't be impressing anyone with your quality snaps though. The front camera CLAIMS to be 2MP, but the CMOS sensor is of much worse quality, color and tone are much different than the rear camera, but guess what, there is an FFC on here, and it works great for selfies when you need them. Surprisingly there is a back light on the touch controls, most budget phones skip these.What you don't get: not even EDGE (2.5G), GRPS(2G) can be blisteringly slow if you are a 'media' person. Even browsing modern mobile websites on this phone over Edge can be painful. It does have Wifi, and Wifi works great. GRPS works just fine for Maps, and Email. I'm a casual business user, and so I only need this phone to stay connected, it does that job.I recommend using UC Browser or Opera Mobile for non sensitive browsing (these are proxified browsers that convert web pages to WAP). I use these WAP conversion browsers to help with speed on GRPS (makes it bearable), and also helps with the low 256Mb memory. Most of the 'slow downs' i've experienced come after using the default Android browser on a heavy web site.The battery is fairly small but the settings have been tailored, that if you have access to wifi the battery will last a long while. Since this is an GRPS phone though, if you leave background Syncing on, you will drain your battery.A few notable things are missing that allows some of the over specing (Dual Core 1.2 Ghz Processors).You also do not get, Gyro Sensor, no Ambient Light, or Proximity Sensors, Compass(not needed for google navigation). What that means is you don't get Auto Brightness Controls, When you bring the phone to your face the phone has less sensors to detect positioning - sometimes you face dial, orientation requires a shake (can get stuck). Or Geo orientation in the Google Maps, you'll need to know which direction you are walking physically.Still a great phone maker, I would buy this phone again, and would not hesitate buying one of their more premium models.

Reviews.Title: A bargain for the price
Reviews.Author: chester johnson
Reviews.Content: With so many offerings available in iphones It took me two months after diligent research to make a decision. Still had my doubts until I actually started using the phone. It worked great. Would  choose a different color next time.

Reviews.Title: Fantastically made for the price!
Reviews.Author: Sergio G.
Reviews.Content: I just ordered this phone. One day shipping, came the expected day. The phone is super light and nice! It has the newest version of Android and for what I heard, not even the Samsung Galaxy has that version of Android. The battery stays charge, and it comes with everything they say it comes with. I'm currently using with the AT&T; Straight Talk SIM card and is working great. The only thing that I think they could have done better is the mega pixels on the camera. It has a poor resolution. But other than that, I just got me an amazing phone. I would definitely recommend this phone to anyone wanting to buy a good phone for less than a 100 bucks. I'm very happy with my purchase. :)

Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone
Reviews.Author: Bruce Showers
Reviews.Content: I Absolutely Love This Phone Its Great !!! Couldn't Ask For Anything Better ! ITS GREAT WITH AT&T; Network!! You Get Your Money Worth

Reviews.Content: great phone, fast downloading will recommend to buy. just bought in April for my birthday and will not trade. great device for the pice

Reviews.Title: She's in love
Reviews.Author: Danielle Rogers
Reviews.Content: I brought it for my daughter and she loves it. It has 2 SIM cards, it has the capability of having two separate numbers to this one device.

Reviews.Title: My first gift to myself  <3
Reviews.Author: Mary DeJesus
Reviews.Content: I love the phone first smart phone I've ever had .At first had some issues but the issues wasn't with the phone itself just that I'm not tech savvy , texting would work was so frustrated til my young daughter told me to add 1 plus the area code with the number then i was good to go with all the texting ,aim so on and so forth ,lol .But otherwise a great product and swift delivery,Thank You <3  !!!HAPPY HOLIDAY!!!

Reviews.Title: didnt work for AT&T;
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived the next day and was brand new still im the packaging. I would have given it more stars if it would have actually been able to work with my phone company.  I have AT&T; and the phone wouldnt recognize its service.

Reviews.Title: Looks/feels nice, poor camera
Reviews.Author: Andrew D. Wong
Reviews.Content: It is very light and has descent responsiveness; haven't noticed any major problems with its limited ram.  Camera quality is quite poor.  2G limitation works fine with T-mobile.

Reviews.Title: This phone isn't good !!!
Reviews.Author: Steven Murphy
Reviews.Content: This phone did not meet my expectations... I have a new one now that is way better !!! I can't find anyone willing to buy the phone ..that sucks on my behalf !!!

Reviews.Title: Simply awful - wouldn't recommend to anyone
Reviews.Author: Greg M.
Reviews.Content: Pros:Nice, modern designCons:Everything elseI was extremely disappointed with this phone. It works, but is not very sensitive to touch, is slow, and often does not download apps or open pages properly. It is incredibly frustrating to use because it doesn't function properly. Usually when I tap something, it does something else rather than what I wanted it to do. I bought this phone brand new, so I know nothing happened to it before. Save your money. Invest in another phone.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy this Phone
Reviews.Author: C.Rutledge
Reviews.Content: I actually bought TWO of these phones for my sons. The first one arrived with a broken screen; but the second one seemed fine. Of course, after the 30-day warranty wore off, my son dropped his from the couch onto the carpeted floor and the screen broken on impact. These are very delicate phones apparently. Certainly not something you would want for teenagers!

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY THIS PHONE.
Reviews.Author: Kelsie Nelson
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for 3 months. Today it stopped working. The screen is white and won't turn on. I hate this phone so much. It has always been slow too.

Reviews.Title: Phone for children
Reviews.Author: Spence
Reviews.Content: This phone was great for the first couple of weeks. However, not later on.A very bad sensitive touch. The SD card mounts and un-mounts on its own.Its a phone for children between the ages of 9-13 not for adults...

Reviews.Title: Slow phone

Reviews.Content: This phone is very slow ! You have to wait 3-10s (that depends on the application) before each loading.But for this price it is normal that there are some drawbacks.

ProductInfo.Features:
MTK6572 Dual core CPU, 1.2GHz
4 inch big screen, resolution: WVGA, 800x480 pixels.
Smart phone, fashion design, multi-color back shell, dimension of 125 x 62 x 9.9mm
Operating system: Android 4.2.2. Dual Cameras, CMOS sensor provide good image quality, front camera 0.3MP, back camera 2.0MP with flashlight
Built-in GPS, easy positioning your location. Network: 2G: GSM 900/1800MHz.
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked Cubot GT72 4.0 inch Android 4.2 Smartphone MTK6572 Dual Core Mobile Phone GPS WiFi Cellphone (White)
